alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Irwin; Mitchell; Tift; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Irwin, northeastern Mitchell, northwestern Colquitt, Tift and southeastern Worth Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Poulan to 6 miles west of Doerun. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Sylvester, Moultrie, Omega, Norman Park, Poulan, Doerun, Ty Ty, Phillipsburg, Schley, Sumner, Sale City, Minton, Scooterville, Anderson City, Tempy, Waterloo, Sigsbee, Pritchetts and Poplar Arbor Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
